testcaseName: # 2 Pentacel at 6 yrs 11.5 mo. Off label but counts. Current Age 7 years
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered, Pentacel, as the second dose of the DTaP vaccine, at age 6 years 11.5 months that the dose is valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange:
V4.0: Updated forecast to align with new Tdap Catch-up Job Aid. Forecast in 6 months.
Past Due Date was missing and child is in catch-up.  Past Due Date added to align with Recommended Date.
Interval Priority Flag with Override allows for a vaccine to be given sooner than a previous date set by multiple vaccines.
